name: Doctor Strange A Portalformer Adventure
description: Doctor Strange: A Portalformer Adventure is an action platformer videogame, made by two students for the subject of Desenvolvimento de Jogos Digitais 1 of the Universidade Lusófona de Humanidades Tecnologias. The Game is inspired by the stories of Doctor Strange whose rights belong to Disney and Marvel. This videogame was created exclusively for academic purposes.
